subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Ewen McKenzie was named Tuesday as the new manager of the Wallabies, replacing the New Zealander Robbie Deans, who was the first foreigner to coach the team.
snippet: Ewen McKenzie was named Tuesday as the new manager of the Wallabies, replacing the New Zealander Robbie Deans, who was the first foreigner to coach the team.
